ygData.subject: Re: Newbie Note...
ygData.msgSnippet: You really have two choices.  Don t worry about the quest.  Its really not that big of a deal.  The sashes and headbands are nice but not esential.  Or, you
ygData.messageBody:
You really have two choices. Don't worry about the quest. Its really not that big of a deal. The sashes and headbands are nice but not esential. Or, you can start over. I know that it doesn't sound to appealing but in the long run you really won't miss the time you spent redoing those first few levels.

Mark
